nodes.text: Rido-Attar was a male Draethos who was born more than six hundred years before the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Sometime before 4,243 BBY, he embarked on a galaxy-spanning journey and did not return to the Core Worlds until sometime during the Cold War, over six hundred years later. Around 3643 BBY, he recounted stories and secrets of the heroes of the Jedi Civil War while on the planet Alsakan.
Rido-Attar was first mentioned in the Archaeology Crew Skill mission "The Storyteller" in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
